author: Alexander Smith and Philip Sime
title: Britain jolted by new virus reality as Boris Johnson receives oxygen in intensive care
description: Johnson, 55, is not on a ventilator and doesn't have pneumonia but has needed oxygen support while on the critical care ward, a government spokesman said.
content:
LONDON British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's move to intensive care has shaken the nation, a jolting reminder that the coronavirus does not discriminate whom it infects and sickens.
Johnson, 55, is not on a ventilator and doesn't have pneumonia but has need… [+5960 chars]
